promptFromSettingsDesc: Use the prompt configured in Settings > Prompts
estimationNote: Estimation based on official Gemini API documentation. Actual usage may vary.
actualNote: Actual count from Gemini API. This is the precise token usage.
adjustedNote: Real count from Gemini API, adjusted for selected media resolution. More accurate than estimation.
exceedsLimit: Warning: Token count exceeds model limit. Consider reducing FPS or using a higher-capacity model.
